title: TWICE: Seize the Light
overview: TWICE has successfully opened their first world tour ''TWICE World Tour 2019 ''Twicelights''. TWICE members introduce and unveil the journey of how 9 members became TWICE - from the years of trainees overcoming the hardships of stress and pressure, to becoming one of the most popular K-pop groups. The real TWICE documentary of the beginning, present and the future of TWICE, everything you've never seen anywhere.
